training.cardDescription1: Strength, mobility, and drills tailored to your position on the field.
training.cardDescription2: Nutrition and recovery tips to help you train harder and bounce back faster.
training.cardDescription3: Daily habits and mental tools to build resilience, discipline, and drive.
training.cardDescription4: Tactical analysis and match breakdowns to sharpen your football intelligence.

cardCoaches.feature1: 1. Personalized training plans created by real pro-level coaches.
cardCoaches.feature2: 2. Direct chat access for questions, feedback, and progress tracking.
cardCoaches.feature3: 3. Monthly follow-up calls or video reviews to support your growth.
cardCoaches.footerText: Connect with coaches that are working with professionals everyday.
